section.heading: Establishment of the donor registry.
section.text: There is established a donor registry for residents of the District of Columbia, which shall be maintained by the federally designated organ procurement organization serving the District of Columbia.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 7-1531.01 and § 7-1531.19f.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 20 of the Revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act (2006).
